TopicTitle: Space Station and the Mobile Processing Lab

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Quick question about my space station and the science lab. This is the first time I've put a science lab in orbit. As I constructed the station I brought up 2 kerbals and one is located in the PPD-12 Cupola module on the top of the station. Bill is in the storage container at the bottom of the station.

I brought 2 more kerbals up to the station to man the science lab (Jeb and Bob). I put them both in the science module but they don't show up as a part of the station. I can't get them out of the science module and I fear they may be lost forever inside the science module. I can't figure it out. Anyone else experienced this problem or have a solution? Pictures showing my problem.

Station configuration: http://i.imgur.com/GF8eZPl.jpg

It's all full: http://i.imgur.com/rkrMzvl.jpg

Edited January 24, 2014 by taylorbm

1. Hover your mouse over the hatch. It will say "Crew Hatch".

2. Click.

3. Select the crew member you want to exit.

4. Crew member goes EVA.

5. ???

6. PROFIT!!!!

Alternately, get the Kerbal Crew Manifest plugin, which allows you to move Kerbals around without going EVA for each. It also allows you to alter or even create Kerbals and their stats (stupidity, courage, and the "Badass" flag that only Jeb has at the start.)

1. Hover your mouse over the hatch. It will say "Crew Hatch".

2. Click.

3. Select the crew member you want to exit.

4. Crew member goes EVA.

5. ???

6. PROFIT!!!!

Alternately, get the Kerbal Crew Manifest plugin, which allows you to move Kerbals around without going EVA for each. It also allows you to alter or even create Kerbals and their stats (stupidity, courage, and the "Badass" flag that only Jeb has at the start.)

Well that was easy. Thanks! I can't believe I didn't figure it out. I would've thought they'd show up in the group of kerbals in the bottom right and I could EVA them that way but maybe that'll be in a future update. In any case, thanks.
